subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
lead_paragraph: Kurt Busch passed Jimmie Johnson for the lead with 10 laps to go and held on to win the Nascar Sprint Cup Series STP 500 at Martinsville Speedway in Virginia. It was Busch’s first win there since October 2002.
snippet: Kurt Busch passed Jimmie Johnson for the lead with 10 laps to go and held on to win the Nascar Sprint Cup Series STP 500 at Martinsville Speedway in Virginia. It was Busch’s first win there since October 2002.
